cleaned_text: News and Articles [What does "anti-vaccine" really mean since the pandemic hit?](https://sciencebasedmedicine.org/what-does-antivaccine-really-mean-since-the-pandemic-hit/) Dr Gorski writes on how the meaning of the term "anti-vaccine" has changed since the pandemic. (Spoiler, it hasn't changed much). Many people dismiss the term "anti-vaccine" as
